Question
========

Which pair of contrasts is/are orthogonal?

Contrast 1: (+2 -1 0 -1)

Contrast 2: (+1 +1 0 -2)

Contrast 3: (-1 0 +1 0) 
Answerlist
----------
* Contrasts 1 and 2
* Contrasts 1 and 3
* Contrasts 1 and 2 plus contrasts 2 and 3
* None of the contrast pairs

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
